comments:
Enviroment:
Eclipse 3.0 + CDT 2.0 build 20040816
Using standard make project.

Steps to reproduce:
1. open Project Properties->Builders and uncheck CDT Makefile builder check-box
2. goto Project Properties->C/C++ Make Project and press Apply button

Problem:
Error is shown: "Missing Builder: org.eclipse.cdt.make.core.makeBuilder"
Thought i don't want to use default CDT makefile builder. i'm using external.
